articles.description:
RT DevNTell
Random thought 🤔
What if we did a demo day?
Think of it like DevNTell of today but on a grander scale held yearly/semi yearly that gives a set of builders/teams a chance to pitch their products to the @developer_dao in a competition style with potential prizing
What say you?

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT zainabhasan.eth 🦇🔊
The Internet is a network of independent computers connecting to share data (whether to read, write, store, or all). Similarly, @cosmos connects separate blockchains. As the internet uses HTTP protocol, Cosmos uses IBC protocol.
Read in detail! https://xord.com/research/cosmos-an-architectural-guide/

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Mac Budkowski
Explaining web3 products is hard.
So to solve that problem, I talked with 100+ web3 founders, both as part of running @web3talks and through casual conversations. 
I also went through top web3 projects to find examples of great product communications.
Here's the guide.
👇👇👇
